com.pump.plaf

Class DecoratedTreeUI.RepaintingTreeDecoration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.plaf.DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
      • com.pump.plaf.DecoratedTreeUI.RepaintingTreeDecoration
  • Enclosing class:
    DecoratedTreeUI

    public static class DecoratedTreeUI.RepaintingTreeDecoration
extends DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
    A TreeDecoration that continually repaints itself as long as it is visible. This is used for animating decorations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration decoration

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        public final boolean isVisible(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                               java.lang.Object value,
                               boolean selected,
                               boolean expanded,
                               boolean leaf,
                               int row,
                               boolean hasFocus)
        Returns whether this decoration should be visible.

        Do not override this method. To customize the visibility of this object, change the TreeDecoration this decoration delegates to.

        Specified by:
        isVisible in class DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
        Parameters:
        tree - the tree being rendered
        value - the tree node being rendered
        selected - whether the tree node is selected
        expanded - whether the tree node is expanded
        leaf - whether the tree node is a leaf node
        row - the row index of the tree node
        Returns:
        whether this decoration is visible.

      • getIcon

        public javax.swing.Icon getIcon(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                                java.lang.Object value,
                                boolean selected,
                                boolean expanded,
                                boolean leaf,
                                int row,
                                boolean isRollover,
                                boolean isPressed)
        Description copied from class: DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
        Returns the icon this decoration should currently render.

        It is assumed this icon will not change dimensions.

        Specified by:
        getIcon in class DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
        Parameters:
        tree - the tree being rendered
        value - the tree node being rendered
        selected - whether the tree node is selected
        expanded - whether the tree node is expanded
        leaf - whether the tree node is a leaf node
        row - the row index of the tree node
        isRollover - whether the mouse is hovering over this decoration
        isPressed - whether the mouse is pressed to arm this icon, similar to how buttons are armed.
        Returns:
        the icon this decoration should currently render.

        Description copied from class: DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
        Returns an optional ActionListener to be notified when this decoration is clicked. If this returns null then no ActionEvent will be issued when this decoration is clicked.
